name: tfg-kathrina-arrocha-umpierrez
description: Tablero Kanban para seguimiento del proyecto: https://github.com/PAL-ULL/tfg-kathrina-arrocha-umpierrez/projects/1

scripts.pull-sub: git submodule foreach --recursive 'git pull origin master'
scripts.push-sub: npm run commit-sub; git submodule foreach --recursive 'git push origin master'
scripts.init: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.remove-submodule: git submodule deinit -f -- a/submodule &&  rm -rf .git/modules/a/submodule && git rm -f a/submodule

author: Casiano Rodriguez-Leon <casiano.rodriguez.leon@gmail.com> (https://github.com/crguezl)
